name: Air Conflicts: Pacific Carriers
summary: True heroes know no bounds! Experience top combat action in this brand new arcade flight sim and become immersed in the exploits of famous aircraft carriers. Choose the side you want to play on: the US Navy or the Imperial Japanese Navy. Climb into the cockpit and re-live the most famous battles of the War in the Pacific.

esrb.synopsis: This is a flight simulation game in which players pilot realistic war planes in combat missions during World War II. Players participate in dogfights, bombing raids, torpedo runs, and other aerial missions. Players use machine guns and bombs to destroy enemy aircraft and ground targets. Battles are highlighted by realistic gunfire and fiery plane crashes. When players are shot or injured in planes, small drops of blood briefly appear on screen. The words “bastard” and “b*tch” can be heard in the dialogue.

pegi.synopsis:
The content of this game is suitable for persons aged 16 years and over only.
It contains: Realistic looking violence
